title: Impact of COVID-19 on University Students' Mental Health and Learning: Overcoming Strategies in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience and understanding of basic psychological concepts
context.additional_context: Learners from medical, legal, and technical professions analyze psychological impacts of COVID-19 and online learning effectiveness, considering smartphone-centric, resource-limited technological environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three impacts of COVID-19 on university students' psychological states (e.g., anxiety, decreased concentration).
Learners can identify at least two academic difficulties in online learning environments and propose improvement strategies.
Learners can enhance online learning efficiency by over 20% using self-management strategies (e.g., time management, stress-reduction techniques).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
